languages.text: "Меня почти сразу забрали в Схола Прогениум, там наставники выковали из меня арбитра. Я учился со всем рвением, потому что отец служил мне примером несгибаемого долга и достоинства. Единственное, в чем я не равнялся на него, была ненависть — он не прививал ее мне, она просто всегда была со мной". {n}В бесстрастном взгляде нет ни капли эмоций.{/n} "Я никогда не сомневался, что преступное отребье заслуживает лишь плахи. Убийство отца сделало мою ненависть кристально ясной, завершенной".

"I was sent to the Schola Progenium right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student, thanks to the example of unyielding duty and dignity my father set for me. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."
languages.original_text: "Меня почти сразу забрали в Схола Прогениум, там наставники выковали из меня арбитра. Я учился со всем рвением, потому что отец служил мне примером несгибаемого долга и достоинства. Единственное, в чем я не равнялся на него, была ненависть — он не прививал ее мне, она просто всегда была со мной". {n}В бесстрастном взгляде нет ни капли эмоций.{/n} "Я никогда не сомневался, что преступное отребье заслуживает лишь плахи. Убийство отца сделало мою ненависть кристально ясной, завершенной".

traits.locale_text: "They sent me to the Schola right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student thanks to my father's example of unyielding duty and dignity. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't teach it to me — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that made my hatred crystal clear, complete."

He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."

languages.text: 「その直後、私は教導院に送られました。そこでメンターたちに鍛え上げられ、アービトレイターになりました。父が示してくれた、揺るぎない義務感と威厳の手本があったおかげで、私は熱心に学びに励みました。父から学ぶ必要がなかったのは、憎しみだけです。それを教えたのは父ではありません。憎しみは、もともと私自身のものだったんです」{n}ソロモーンの視線には、一片の感情もなかった。{/n}「犯罪者という名の害虫どもには、処刑以外の価値などない。そのことを、私はかつて一度も疑ったことはありません。ですが、私の憎しみを本当に確かなものにし、完全なものにしたのは…父の死でした」
languages.original_text: "I was sent to the Schola Progenium right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student, thanks to the example of unyielding duty and dignity my father set for me. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."

traits.locale_text: 「その直後、私は教導院に送られました。そこでメンターたちに鍛え上げられ、アービトレイターになりました。父が示してくれた、揺るぎない義務感と威厳の手本があったおかげで、私は熱心に学びに励みました。父から学ぶ必要がなかったのは、憎しみだけです。それを教えたのは父ではありません。憎しみは、もともと私自身のものだったんです」{n}ソロモーンの視線には、一片の感情もなかった。{/n}「犯罪者という名の害虫どもには、処刑以外の価値などない。そのことを、私はかつて一度も疑ったことはありません。ですが、私の憎しみを本当に確かなものにし、完全なものにしたのは…父の死でした」

languages.text: "Direkt danach wurde ich zur Schola Progenium geschickt, und die Mentoren formten aus mir einen Arbitrator. Ich war ein eifriger Schüler, denn mein Vater war für mich ein Vorbild an unbedingter Pflichterfüllung und Würde. Das Einzige, was ich nicht von ihm hatte, war der Hass. Den hat er nicht in mir verankert – der war schon immer da." {n}Solomornes Blick ist völlig emotionslos.{/n} "Ich habe nie daran gezweifelt, dass kriminelles Ungeziefer hingerichtet werden muss, aber nach dem Tod meines Vaters kristallisierte sich mein Hass, machte ihn vollständig."
languages.original_text: "I was sent to the Schola Progenium right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student, thanks to the example of unyielding duty and dignity my father set for me. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."

traits.locale_text: "Direkt danach wurde ich zur Schola Progenium geschickt, und die Mentoren formten aus mir einen Arbitrator. Ich war ein eifriger Schüler, denn mein Vater war für mich ein Vorbild an unbedingter Pflichterfüllung und Würde. Das Einzige, was ich nicht von ihm hatte, war der Hass. Den hat er nicht in mir verankert – der war schon immer da." {n}Solomornes Blick ist völlig emotionslos.{/n} "Ich habe nie daran gezweifelt, dass kriminelles Ungeziefer hingerichtet werden muss, aber nach dem Tod meines Vaters kristallisierte sich mein Hass, machte ihn vollständig."

languages.text: « J'ai été envoyé à la Schola Progenium à la suite de ces événements et les mentors ont fait de moi un arbitrator. J'étais un élève modèle, cherchant à suivre les pas de mon père qui incarnait à la perfection le sens du devoir et la dignité. Mais il y a une chose qu'il ne m'avait pas instillée : ma haine. Elle a toujours été là, au fond de moi, {n}déclare Solomorne d'un ton parfaitement égal.{/n} Je n'ai jamais douté que toutes les vermines criminelles ne méritaient rien de mieux que l'exécution. Mais la mort de mon père a achevé de me convaincre, m'incitant à cristalliser cette haine. »
languages.original_text: "I was sent to the Schola Progenium right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student, thanks to the example of unyielding duty and dignity my father set for me. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été envoyé à la Schola Progenium à la suite de ces événements et les mentors ont fait de moi un arbitrator. J'étais un élève modèle, cherchant à suivre les pas de mon père qui incarnait à la perfection le sens du devoir et la dignité. Mais il y a une chose qu'il ne m'avait pas instillée : ma haine. Elle a toujours été là, au fond de moi, {n}déclare Solomorne d'un ton parfaitement égal.{/n} Je n'ai jamais douté que toutes les vermines criminelles ne méritaient rien de mieux que l'exécution. Mais la mort de mon père a achevé de me convaincre, m'incitant à cristalliser cette haine. »

languages.text: «Después de aquello me enviaron a la Schola Progenium, y sus mentores me moldearon hasta hacer de mí un Arbitrator. Fui un estudiante modelo, gracias al ejemplo de inquebrantable dignidad y sentido del deber que supuso mi padre para mí. Lo único que no me hizo falta heredar de él fue el odio. Eso no me lo inculcó; siempre lo he tenido dentro». {n}La expresión de Solomorne está totalmente desprovista de emociones.{/n} «Nunca he dudado que la escoria criminal mereciese otra cosa que una ejecución sumaria, pero fue la muerte de mi padre lo que verdaderamente consolidó mi odio».
languages.original_text: "I was sent to the Schola Progenium right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student, thanks to the example of unyielding duty and dignity my father set for me. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."

traits.locale_text: «Después de aquello me enviaron a la Schola Progenium, y sus mentores me moldearon hasta hacer de mí un Arbitrator. Fui un estudiante modelo, gracias al ejemplo de inquebrantable dignidad y sentido del deber que supuso mi padre para mí. Lo único que no me hizo falta heredar de él fue el odio. Eso no me lo inculcó; siempre lo he tenido dentro». {n}La expresión de Solomorne está totalmente desprovista de emociones.{/n} «Nunca he dudado que la escoria criminal mereciese otra cosa que una ejecución sumaria, pero fue la muerte de mi padre lo que verdaderamente consolidó mi odio».

languages.text: “在那之后，我就被送到了忠嗣学院，学院的导师把我训练成了一位法务官。我是个求知若渴的学生，而这一切都要归功于父亲为我竖立的榜样。他生前是个不屈不挠的人，满怀责任与尊严。至于我心里的恨意，那并不是他灌输给我的——对我而言，仇恨始终如影随形。”{n}索罗蒙的目光没有任何感情。{/n}“所有犯了罪的渣滓都该判处死刑，这点我从来没怀疑过。不过，父亲的死让我的仇恨变得更加具体、更加彻底。”
languages.original_text: "I was sent to the Schola Progenium right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student, thanks to the example of unyielding duty and dignity my father set for me. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."

languages.text: "Hemen ardından Schola Progenium'a gönderildim ve oradaki akıl hocaları beni Yargıcı yaptılar. Sarsılmaz görev bilinci ve haysiyetiyle bana örnek olan babam sayesinde hevesli bir öğrenciydim. Ondan almam gerekmeyen tek şey nefretiydi. Bana hiçbir zaman bu nefreti aşılamadı, daima yanımda oldu." {n}Solomorne'un gözleri duygudan yoksun bakıyor.{/n} "Suçlu asalakların infazdan başka hiçbir şeyi hak etmediklerinden asla şüphe etmedim ancak nefretimi bütünüyle somutlaştıran ve tamamlayan, babamın ölümü oldu."
languages.original_text: "I was sent to the Schola Progenium right after that, and the mentors there forged me into an Arbitrator. I was an eager student, thanks to the example of unyielding duty and dignity my father set for me. The only thing I didn't need to borrow from him was hate. He didn't instil that — it was always with me." {n}Solomorne's gaze is completely emotionless.{/n} "I never doubted that criminal vermin deserve only execution, but it was my father's death that truly crystallised my hatred, made it complete."
